.. _news:

News
====

1.1 / 2010-03-01
----------------

- Improved HTTP Parser - Now buffered.
- Logging facility

1.0 / 2010-02-28
----------------

- New HTTP Parser and major refactoring
- Added OAuth support
- Added HTTP Filter
- Added support of chunked encoding
- Removed `rest.RestClient`
- Add Connection pool working with Eventlet 0.9.6
